query.stmt:
select * from ( select t.*,rownum rn from ( select bnc.id,bnc.title,to_char(SUBSTR(bnc.content_text,0,40)) content,sf.id file_id, 'BI_NEWS_CENTER' code_table,bnc.type code_num,to_char(bnc.create_time,'mm-dd') create_time from bi_news_center bnc left join sys_file sf on sf.busi_type='BI_NEWS_CENTER' and sf.busi_id=to_char(bnc.id) where bnc.type=1 order by bnc.create_time desc,sf.id desc) t) where rn<=5
union all select t.* from ( select id,substr(title,0,22)||'...' title,'' content,'' file_ids,'BI_POLICY_REGULATION' code_table,-1,to_char(bpr.create_time,'mm-dd') create_time,rownum rn from bi_policy_regulation bpr order by bpr.create_time desc) t where rownum<=7
union all select * from ( with files as ( select busi_type,busi_id,wm_concat(to_char(id)) file_ids,wm_concat(to_char(name)) file_names from sys_file group by busi_type,busi_id) select t.* from ( select id,substr(title,0,19)||'...' title,'' content,'' file_ids,'BI_NOTICE' code_table,-1,to_char(bi_notice.create_time,'mm-dd') create_time,rownum rn from bi_notice where type=1 order by create_time desc) t where rownum<=5 )
union all select * from ( select t.*,rownum rn from ( select bnc.id,bnc.title,to_char(SUBSTR(bnc.content_text,0,40)) content,sf.id file_id, 'BI_NEWS_CENTER' code_table,bnc.type code_num,to_char(bnc.create_time,'mm-dd') create_time from bi_news_center bnc left join sys_file sf on sf.busi_type='BI_NEWS_CENTER' and sf.busi_id=to_char(bnc.id) where bnc.type=2 order by bnc.create_time desc,sf.id desc) t) where rn<=5
union all select cou,to_char(name),'','','FGPH',-1,'' create_time,rownum rn from (select * from ( select spd.name,count(1) cou from bi_manu bm left join sys_p_department spd on bm.dept_id=spd.id group by spd.name) a order by cou desc)
